
= ComponentMeta =

   ==This is the basic file and folder metadata definition, which provides the basic information about each files, also, give the structure of the folders using tree structure.==

----
= Attributes =
 ==== public enum Type`{` New,Modified,Deleted,NotTouched `}` ====
    Defines the type (or status) of one file. 
    New: first created 
    Modified: being modified by other side
    Deleted: Deleted by other side
    NotTouched: No change on both sides
